entity.name: Travel Actions
entity.description: This entity includes all conversations about travel and vacation.

text:
@realDonaldTrump So tRumps address in summary:
     • Trump, unlike most leaders, saw the threat of COVID-19 early & restricted travel from China
     • Europe wasn't so smart
     • As a result, this "foreign virus" spread
     • By banning travel from Europe we will beat the foreign invader
